sn22.33:1.3: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:1.5: Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha.
sn22.33:1.6: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:1.8: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:1.11: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn22.33:1.13: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:2.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṃ imasmiṃ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ taṃ jano hareyya vā ḍaheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya.
sn22.33:2.3: ‘amhe jano harati vā ḍahati vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karotī’”ti?
sn22.33:2.6: “Na hi no etaṃ, bhante, attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti.
sn22.33:2.7: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha.
sn22.33:2.8: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:2.10: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:2.14: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
